import { IconButton } from "./iconButton" import { FaEdit, FaHeart, FaReply, FaTrash } from "react-icons/fa" const dateFormatter = new Intl.DateTimeFormat(undefined, { dateStyle: "medium", timeStyle: "short", }) export function Comment({ id, message, user, createdAt }) { return <>
{user.name} {dateFormatter.format(Date.parse(createdAt))}
{message}
2
}
